verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* there was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* a \w reed|strong="G2563"\w* like \w unto|strong="G3664"\w* a \w rod|strong="G4464"\w*: and the angel stood, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Rise|strong="G1453"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w measure|strong="G3354"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w altar|strong="G2379"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w therein|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* the \w court|strong="G0833"\w* which is \w without|strong="G2081"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w leave|strong="G1544"\w* \w out|strong="G1854"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w measure|strong="G3354"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* it is \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* shall they tread under \w foot|strong="G3961"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \add and\add* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w months|strong="G3376"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I will \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \add power\add* \w unto|strong="G1417"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they shall \w prophesy|strong="G4395"\w* a \w thousand|strong="G5507"\w* two \w hundred|strong="G1250"\w* \add and\add* \w threescore|strong="G1835"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w clothed|strong="G4016"\w* in \w sackcloth|strong="G4526"\w*.

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* the \w two|strong="G1417"\w* olive \w trees|strong="G1636"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w candlesticks|strong="G3087"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w hurt|strong="G0091"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w proceedeth|strong="G1607"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w devoureth|strong="G2719"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w enemies|strong="G2190"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w hurt|strong="G0091"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* in this \w manner|strong="G3779"\w* be \w killed|strong="G0615"\w*.

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* to \w shut|strong="G2808"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* it \w rain|strong="G1026"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w waters|strong="G5204"\w* to \w turn|strong="G4762"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w smite|strong="G3960"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* with \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w plagues|strong="G4127"\w*, as \w often|strong="G3740"\w* \w as|strong="G1437"\w* they \w will|strong="G2309"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* they shall have \w finished|strong="G5055"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w*, the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* that \w ascendeth|strong="G0305"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the bottomless \w pit|strong="G0012"\w* shall \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w war|strong="G4171"\w* \w against|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w overcome|strong="G3528"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w kill|strong="G0615"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* dead \w bodies|strong="G4430"\w* \add shall lie\add* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the \w street|strong="G4113"\w* of the \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w spiritually|strong="G4153"\w* is \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Sodom|strong="G4670"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*, \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* was \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w kindreds|strong="G5443"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* shall \w see|strong="G0991"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* dead \w bodies|strong="G4430"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* an \w half|strong="G2255"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G0863"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w suffer|strong="G0863"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* dead \w bodies|strong="G4430"\w* to be \w put|strong="G5087"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w graves|strong="G3418"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* that \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* make \w merry|strong="G2165"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w gifts|strong="G1435"\w* one to \w another|strong="G0240"\w*; \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w tormented|strong="G0928"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w dwelt|strong="G2730"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* an \w half|strong="G2255"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* from \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which \w saw|strong="G2334"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, Come \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w hither|strong="G5602"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they ascended \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w enemies|strong="G2190"\w* \w beheld|strong="G2334"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w same|strong="G1565"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* was \w there|strong="G1096"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w earthquake|strong="G4578"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the tenth \w part|strong="G1182"\w* of the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w fell|strong="G4098"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w earthquake|strong="G4578"\w* were \w slain|strong="G0615"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w remnant|strong="G3062"\w* \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w affrighted|strong="G1719"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* to the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*.

The \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w woe|strong="G3759"\w* is \w past|strong="G0565"\w*; \add and\add*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w woe|strong="G3759"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w quickly|strong="G5035"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w seventh|strong="G1442"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w sounded|strong="G4537"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w voices|strong="G5456"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, The \w kingdoms|strong="G0932"\w* of this \w world|strong="G2889"\w* are \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \add the kingdoms\add* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he shall \w reign|strong="G0936"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w twenty|strong="G1501"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*, which \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w seats|strong="G2362"\w*, \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w faces|strong="G4383"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, We \w give|strong="G2168"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w Almighty|strong="G3841"\w*, which \w art|strong="G5607"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wast|strong="G2258"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* art to \w come|strong="G2064"\w*; \w because|strong="G3754"\w* thou hast taken to \w thee|strong="G2983"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hast \w reigned|strong="G0936"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* were \w angry|strong="G3710"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* is \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w time|strong="G2540"\w* of the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, that they should be \w judged|strong="G2919"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* that thou shouldest \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w reward|strong="G3408"\w* unto \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w fear|strong="G5399"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*, \w small|strong="G3398"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shouldest \w destroy|strong="G1311"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which \w destroy|strong="G1311"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* was \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there was \w seen|strong="G3700"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* the \w ark|strong="G2787"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w testament|strong="G1242"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w lightnings|strong="G0796"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w voices|strong="G5456"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thunderings|strong="G1027"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* an \w earthquake|strong="G4578"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w hail|strong="G5464"\w*.
